title: Seven Little Australians (1973)
brief_description: Captain Wolcott is a widower with seven children. He marries again and his new wife takes on all the trials of bringing up seven spirited children. They have many adventures, especially one daughter Helen, commonly known as Judy.

constellations_other.name: Page to screen
constellations_other.description: Australian scribes and screenwriters unite on the silver and small screens.
